# DictationTranscriber.ResultAttributeOption.transcriptionConfidence

**Case**

Includes confidence attributes in a transcription’s attributed string.

## Declaration

```swift
case transcriptionConfidence
```

## Discussion

These are `Foundation/AttributeScopes/SpeechAttributes/ConfidenceAttribute` attributes.

## Result attribute options

- **DictationTranscriber.ResultAttributeOption.audioTimeRange**: Includes time-code attributes in a transcription’s attributed string.
